#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define FL(a) memset(a, 0, sizeof a);
#define pi(a) cout <<  a << endl;
#define si(n) scanf("%d",&n)
#define pis(n) printf("%d ",n);
#define FREP(b) for(int i=0;i<b;i++)
#define REP(a,b,c) for(int a=b;a<c;a++)
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef long long LL;
/*
struct data{
};
bool operator < (const data &a1, const data &a2){
}
*/
vector<int> G[100008];
bool deleted[100008];
int anc[100008];
int visited[100008];
void dfs(int u){
    for(int i = 0; i < G[u].size(); i++){
        if(visited[G[u][i]]) continue;
        visited[G[u][i]] = 1;
        anc[G[u][i]] = anc[u] + deleted[u];
        dfs(G[u][i]);
    }
}
int main()
{
    int test,N,u,v,del;
    si(test);
    while(test--){
        FL(deleted); FL(anc); FL(visited);
        si(N);
        FREP(N) G[i+1].clear();
        FREP(N-1){
            si(u);si(v);
            G[u].push_back(v);
            G[v].push_back(u);
        }
        si(del);
        FREP(del){
            si(u);
            deleted[u] = true;
        }
        visited[1] = 1;
        dfs(1);
        double ans = 0;
        REP(i,1,N+1) ans += (double)anc[i]/(double)(1 + anc[i]);
        printf("%.6f\n",ans);
    }
    return 0;
}
